graph_title: Proportion of pensioners to the total number of population at the end of the year
indicator_name: Proportion of pensioners to the total number of population at the end of the year
national_indicator_description: The indicator of the share of pensioners from the total number of populations at the end of the year is the share of pensioners at the end of the year from the total number of the population by gender and age, type of pension, and the population of the appropriate age.
computation_calculations: Ratio of pensioners (by sex and age, type of pension) to the population.
source_organisation_2: Ministry of Labour and Social Affaires of RA
